text: Charles Maudru (1859-1935) was a French film director of the silent era. He was the father of the screenwriter Pierre Maudru.Goble p.351 ==Selected filmography== * Serge Panine (1922) * The King of Paris (1923) * The Loves of Rocambole (1924) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1859 births Category:1935 deaths Category:French film directors
title: Charles Maudru
